column4: Hello can someone help me with this? I'm having bad issues. http://pastie.org/2752107
fever, it is ubuntu 11.10 i believe
yes 11.10 oneric
fever, It downloads the updates then when I got to install or upgrade it just says cy... 50%
what are you trying to do?

I am trying to install things from the ubuntu software store, but I can't install anything, when it lets me press the install button, it crashes right before it installs all the way, but most of the time it wont let me press install at all.
i tend to use synaptic rather than the software centre
yes that wouldn't ne am issue, but i can't isntall it without the software centre right?
sudo apt-get update (that looks for updates) sudo apt-get upgrade (that applies updates) sudo apt-get install <packagename> (that installs packagename)
you haven't pasted what happens
I did but here is what terminal says when I did what you said. http://pastie.org/2752169
that isn't what i told you to do
why are you typing cy tree?
that's the problem, I'm not typing it, that's what happens when I hit enter to excute the command.
try what ubottu suggests
sudo fuser -vki /var/lib/dpkg/lock;sudo dpkg --configure -a
just out of interest, what is the output of uname -a
what is the output of uname -a?
do you want me to run that command in terminal?
yes please
i'm not sure what java is available for 11.10
oh, good
Do you have any ideas what else could be causing it not to be able to connect to minecraft.net when I sign in? I can go on play offline and join my server, it's horribley laggy though.
no idea, i don't do minecraft
